title: MAJOR SERVER LAG ON RANKED QUEUE
body: Crazy drop outs all the time. 500 ping. Everyone in game dropping out. Help riot????

replies.body: Just had a ranked game where my ping was going all over the place. Even after rebooting the modem, it was still sitting at above 115 on average.
And as an aside, I played a few norms today and had excellent connection.

Yeah, just got out of a game where everyone dropped at 5 minutes, minions decided the winner of the game, LP was lost, and I got put into a low priority queue for "leaving" - gg - remind me how much I've spent on skins riot
